sanapuuro.sanapuuro

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • sanapuuro.sanapuuro.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    Keeps track of score and has methods for selecting and adding letters for submission.
    Author:
    skaipio@cs

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(Grid grid, WordEvaluator wordEvaluator, Letters letters)

      Selects the letter from the given location and adds to selected letter containers if there is any at the location.

        public LetterContainer getLastSelection()
        Gets player's latest selection.
        Returns:
        Latest selected letter container, null if none has been selected.

      • getFirstSelection

        public LetterContainer getFirstSelection()
        Gets player's first selection.
        Returns:
        First selected letter container, null if none has been selected.

      • addLetterTo

        public boolean addLetterTo(int x,
                  int y)
        Adds a letter container from the letter pool on the given location location if there is no other container already present and adds it to added containers.
        Parameters:
        x - Coordinate to set to.
        y - Coordinate to set to.
        Returns:
        True if adding letter from the letter pool was successful, false otherwise.

      • selectLetterAt

        public boolean selectLetterAt(int x,
                     int y)
        Selects the letter from the given location and adds to selected letter containers if there is any at the location.
        Parameters:
        x - Coordinate to set to.
        y - Coordinate to set to.
        Returns:
        True if there was a container to select, false otherwise.

      • removeLastSelection

        public boolean removeLastSelection()
        Removes the latest selection from player's selected letter containers if there is any.
        Returns:
        True if controls are enabled and there were selected containers, false otherwise.

      • submitSelectedLetters

        public boolean submitSelectedLetters()
        Evaluates currently selected letters and raises the score if evaluation was successful.
        Returns:
        True if letters formed a valid word, false otherwise.
